subject: Sports Injuries
Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Defensive tackle Eric LeGrand, who was paralyzed below the neck, now has sensation throughout his body and movement of his shoulders, Rutgers said.
snippet: Defensive tackle Eric LeGrand, who was paralyzed below the neck, now has sensation throughout his body and movement of his shoulders, Rutgers said.
